wordGroup: natural childbirth n. 自然分娩；不用药物的分娩

sentences.en: Half a million women die needlessly each year during childbirth.
sentences.cn: 每年有50万妇女在分娩时不必要地死去。

sentences.en: The symptoms of morning sickness would be listed and horrors of childbirth pictured.
sentences.cn: 它会列出晨吐的症状，描绘分娩的恐惧。

sentences.en: During childbirth, larger babies have more difficulty passing through the birth canal.
sentences.cn: 在分娩时，较大的婴儿更难通过产道。
